attributes.action: Kick Anjem Choudary out of Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The dude hates Britain and has publicly admitted it yet you're willing to give him a 320K house, all his council tax paid, all benefits. That doesn't make sense and puts national security at rest. In other countries, they'd have deported him straight away back to Al-Qaeda.

He has written to the families of soldiers telling them that their sons died in vain and is organising hate marches against Britain in Britain.

Better yet, I hate Britain now give me a 320K house and everything paid for me.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
